OrgName: Regulatory and Clinical Research Institute, Inc.
activities: The Regulatory and Clinical Research Institute (RCRI) provides services related to designing, deploying, and analyzing clinical study data for medical device, biotechnology, combination products, and diagnostic products for submission to the United States and EU regulatory bodies for market approval of the medical product.  In conducting its clinical research and regulatory operations, RCRI may collect and process data pertaining to clinical study participants, study investigators and other healthcare professionals, industry experts, medical experts, vendors, subcontractors, consultants and others.  These data are collected and transferred to the United States in accordance with the U.S - E.U. and U.S. - Swiss Safe Harbor Frameworks.
contactoff1: Regulatory and Clinical Research Institute Privacy Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
